Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Fighting Module
Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: This module is utilized mostly by soldier Androids on glitterworlds. It enhances the combat capabilities of the user way beyond human limits.\n-- "The way of the warrior."

Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Medical Module
Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: This module is designed for Androids who accompany glitterworld parties offworld. Contains the most cutting edge doctoring software and micro implants to help with first aid and surgery.\n-- "Hello nurse~"

Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Construction Module
Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: Designed for new colonies this module greatly help settlers to setup their new dwellings. Whether inside a mountain or atop a skyscraper this module helps.\n-- "Can we fix it?"

Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Craftmanship Module
Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: Helps the Android to craft and cook much faster than their unupgraded kin. Used in premium crafter Android models in artisan workshops.\n-- "Mine and craft."

Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Agricultural Module
Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: Outfitted with the latest plant and animal farming software this module with the help of a few menial laborers can run a farm on their own. Widely utilized by new glitterworld colonies.\n-- "Old MacDonald had a farm~"

Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Science Module
Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: Augments the Androids reasoning and problem solving abilities beyond human comprehension. Installed on assistant laboratory Androids on glitterworlds all over the galaxy.\n-- "Big day today, Freeman."

Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.label: Diplomacy Module
Androids.AndroidUpgradeDef.description: Gives the Android diplomatic and trading capabilities that seem supernatural. Widely installed on Androids who work on defusing hostage situations.\n-- "My name is Connor. Iâ€™m the android sent by CyberLife."
